title: schwinn logo font
content:
I'd have thought this was perhaps just custom, but have seen Schwinn use quite a few letters in the same typeface--not only "schwinn" but "quality" and "fitness" so it appears a full alphabet could exist.

Anyone know what this font is?

bump.  
I to am curious about this.
